title: Ferox Numine's Author Page
content:
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
**Howdy, welcome to my author page!** 
[[/=]]

Not an in-universe document, I'm afraid. "Doctor Ferox Numine" doesn't have much of a ring to it, anyways.

I was a fan of the SCP community for years, but finally got around to being a contributing member in 2021, when I had nothing better to do than mess around on the computer and test my writing chops (thanks Covid!). I'm based in the US, love writing action and comedy––occasionally both at a time––and am an unabashed photoshop enjoyer. I'm always looking to try new things and improve my craft, but I'm satisfied just to get a good laugh out of my readers.

I'm aware this page is a bit bare at the moment, but consider it a prelude to hopefully great things to come! I'm always open to collaborating and trading crits, so feel free to shoot me a PM!


||~ **Page** ||~ **Excerpt** ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5402 SCP-5402] || //Extra! Extra! Read all about it!// ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7054 SCP-7054] || //It's beer o'clock!// ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-scoop The Scoop] || //What in the hoo-ha is 'People Magazine'?// ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7370 SCP-7370] || //A wrestling ring has been installed in Site-19.// ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7275 SCP-7275] || //Shell shock? My mind is sewn with stronger threads than that, doctor.// ||
|| [[[Feeling Blue |Feeling Blue]]] || //I can give it all back. You can be a winner again.// ||
|| [[[When Blue Hogs Fly |When Blue Hogs Fly]]] || //You got some nerve walking into the champ’s hometown and runnin’ yer mouth about the late, great, legitim-ate art of wrestlin’// ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1986-j SCP-1986-J] || //SCP-1986-J is not to be allowed to win the World Series under any circumstances.// ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/mr-blue-starts-a-coup Mr. Blue Starts a Coup] || aka, "The Great Mystrian Screwjob" ||

author: Ferox Numine
